thread.title: World's heaviest woman's crowdfunding campaign manages to raise Rs 19 lakh so far | Zee News
thread.title_full: World's heaviest woman's crowdfunding campaign manages to raise Rs 19 lakh so far | Zee News

title: World's heaviest woman's crowdfunding campaign manages to raise Rs 19 lakh so far | Zee News
text:
World's heaviest woman's crowdfunding campaign manages to raise Rs 19 lakh so far By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Friday, February 24, 2017 - 12:55 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: World's heaviest woman Eman Ahmed's crowdfunding campaign, which was started by his family has managed to raise Rs 19 lakh so far. 
The well-wishers of the 500 kg woman are on the rise and more money is expected to float in the coming days, says a report. 
World's heaviest woman loses 50 kilos in just 12 days 
Although, doctors at Saifee hospital in Mumbai have vowed to treat her free of cost, yet her travelling from Egypt to India will need a lot of money. 
Eman, who is at the Mumbai hospital; for weight loss treatment among other ailments, has manged to lose almost 50 kilos till now. 
She is following a strict diet regime and is able to life her arm and hold herself up. First Published: Friday, February 24, 2017 - 12:55 More from zeenews
